title: Shortest Path in Binary Matrix
content:
In an N by N square grid, each cell is either empty (0) or blocked (1).
A clear path from top-left to bottom-right has length  if and only if it is composed of cells  such that:

Adjacent cells  and  are connected 8-directionally (ie., they are different and share an edge or corner)
 is at location  (ie. has value )
 is at location  (ie. has value )
If  is located at , then  is empty (ie. ).

Return the length of the shortest such clear path from top-left to bottom-right.  If such a path does not exist, return -1.
